TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Calavi, title = Calavi, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Calavi} }

S.FORM: alang Calavi ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Tayimari go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 81 buwan, 217 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 97% kyan ku 211 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 3% kyan ku 6 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Paywan 96%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Calavi hya' ga Padrangigrang. tay mkyahu' na Calavi hya' ga Tjatjigel. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Calavi ga ungat pqwasan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Calavi ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Tayimari go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 81 bowan, 217 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 97% kyan ko 211 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 3% kyan ko 6 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Paywan 96%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Calavi hya' ga Padrangigrang. tay mkyaho' na Calavi hya' ga Tjatjigel. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Calavi ga ongat pqwasan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
